feature_bullets: Electronics Screwdriver with four different non-magnetic tips in one tool, includes #0 and #00 Phillips plus 1/8-Inch (3.2 mm) and 3/32-Inch (2.4 mm) Slotted tips
Rotating cap for optimum and precise control
Corrosion-resistant chrome plated barrel that includes two double-ended bits that exceed ANSI standards
Cushion-Grip handles for maximum comfort when working on small equipment
Heat treated precision ground tip for greater strength
Has interchangeable shaft for quick bit switch out
title: Klein Tools 32581 4-in-1 Electronics Screwdriver Set with Precision Machines Bits: 2 Slotted, 2 Phillips, and Cushion Grip Handles, 4-Piece
aplus_html:
From the manufacturer

Read more

About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn't just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day. Since 1857.

4-in-1 Electronics Screwdriver Set with Precision Machines Bits: 2 Slotted, 2 Phillips, and Cushion Grip Handles, 4-Piece

Klein Tools electronics screwdrivers are designed for precision work, and feature a swivel cap for optimum control. Made of the highest quality tempered steel, carefully heat-treated for maximum strength, and precision milled to fit screw openings securely. Rotating caps and Klein's exclusive Cushion-Grip handles offer outstanding comfort and control.

  • Electronics Screwdriver with four different non-magnetic tips in one tool, includes #0 and #00 Phillips plus 1/8-Inch (3.2 mm) and 3/32-Inch (2.4 mm) Slotted tips
  • Rotating cap for optimum and precise control
  • Corrosion-resistant chrome plated barrel that includes two double-ended bits that exceed ANSI standards
  • Cushion-Grip handles for maximum comfort when working on small equipment
  • Heat treated precision ground tip for greater strength
  • Has interchangeable shaft for quick bit switch out
  • Lightweight, only 1.1-Ounces (31 g)
Read more

FEATURES

4-in-1 electronics screwdriver has heat-treated precision tip

Screwdriver has cushion grip handle for torque and comfort

Multi-bit screwdriver has rotating cap for precise control

Read more

Made of the highest quality tempered steel, carefully heat-treated for maximum strength, and precision milled to fit screw openings securely. Rotating caps and Klein's exclusive Cushion-Grip handles offer outstanding comfort and control. tag_title: Klein Tools 32581 4-in-1 Electronics Screwdriver Set with Precision Machines Bits: 2 Slotted, 2 Phillips, and Cushion Grip Handles, 4-Piece - - Amazon.com

reviews.title: Handy all in one
reviews.content: This screwdriver offers 2 Phillips and 2 slotted choices. They are great for small appliances and electronics. The other two are great for working on my glasses.

reviews.title: WORKS OK
reviews.content: I don't like how the bits come out pretty easily and the rubber where your hand came off pretty easily so I replaced it with tape

reviews.title: Well made tool
reviews.content: Klein mini screw driver is well made and if you damage it it’s free replacement.  Good price and value.

reviews.title: An excellent byproduct of my search for more screwdriver handles
reviews.content: I have 5 tool bags with various tools for different jobs, and maybe I'm unique (doubtful!) but I've managed to lose the screwdriver handles for a dozen different bit sets.I'm sure they're with the missing socks somewhere?Anyhow, I was looking at inexpensive screwdriver handles and this one happened to be under ten bucks and five stars, so it landed in my search list.I do work on my computers too, and needed a smaller handle screwdriver for...same reason.I had been explicitly looking for kits without extra bits, because I have at least a thousand bits and sockets. Which made this purchase a bit funny. It's the only one I got that came with any bits. And I couldn't find them.I saw it was a "4 in 1" with two of each philips and flathead, but after scrutinizing the packaging and admiring how nicely made this is and what a nice grippy handle it had, I couldn't find the second bit. They're quite small for this sort of driver.The bit end reverses. I hadn't even considered that because the handle didn't look long enough.So you won't lose the "basic" small bits in this. But I will, because I'll lose the handle eventually.GREAT five star buy for under ten dollars. I'll use this a lot!The only thing I'd suggest to the manufacturer is to make tools like these with brightly colored handles. I'm talking neon yellow/orange/red that can be seen from space. Reflective, hell...put a battery and some LED's in it and a speaker that screams periodically for no reason.Because I wanna find the place where all of these screwdriver handles go!I'll update this if it breaks, or if I lose it. Or if years have gone by and I see this review and I've had no trouble with it.For a magnetic screwdriver to put in fun stuff like m.2 nvme screws, this is long enough, precision enough, and has the nice tiny little screw bits for all of those tiny screws you'll find in a pc, phone, etc.A nice accessory for this would be a retractable sleeve for the bits that would hold a longer screw sideways and retract as you drive it.

reviews.title: Use it all the time at work
reviews.content: Comes in handy when you need to tighten terminal block screws and spring clamps. I haven’t found a terminal it won’t fit into, but I’m sure one exists somewhere…just not where I work. There are two sizes of Phillips and Straight, I almost never use the Phillips, though. Would recommend.

reviews.title: Very handy set for small screws
reviews.content: I am so "done" with cheap screwdrivers.  I got this screwdriver because my inexpensive set of multipurpose so-called precision screwdrivers had all stripped in the #0 and ##0 size.  I guess because of poor heat treat.  But this set not only has the Philips head screws in small size but slotted too.  The heat treat seems good since I stopped stripping the screwheads since using this product.  I really like that I can simply flip the tips around to size the screwdriver head to the hole and also like that I don't have to hunt for the tips in a box of other tips.  Overall, this performed exactly as I hoped.  If I had one wish for this device, I wish the grip were just a little fatter to get better torque on the screwheads, but it is a minor concern since the set works so well.
